mapper.insert: INSERT INTO E_rezmsg (reader, rezdate, reztime, writer, content, eno ) VALUES (#{reader}, #{rezdate}, #{reztime}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{eno})
mapper.select: SELECT r.*, u1.username readerName, u2.username writerName FROM E_rezmsg r JOIN GH_User u1 ON r.reader = u1.userid JOIN GH_User u2 ON r.writer = u2.userid WHERE r.writer = #{writer} ORDER BY rno DESC
SELECT r.*, u1.username readerName, u2.username writerName FROM E_rezmsg r JOIN GH_User u1 ON r.reader = u1.userid JOIN GH_User u2 ON r.writer = u2.userid WHERE r.reader = #{reader} ORDER BY rno DESC

SELECT r.rno rno, r.reader reader, r.rezdate rezate, r.reztime reztime, r.writer writer, r.content content, r.regdate regdate, m.username writerName FROM E_rezmsg r LEFT JOIN E_board e ON r.bno = e.bno JOIN GH_User m ON r.writer = m.userid WHERE r.rno = #{rno}
